name: Edges are frends, rounds not
description:
Submission for the Casual GameJam
https://itch.io/jam/casual

The theme was Geometry and i had more ideas, but sadly not enough time to do it.
The round objects are not your freinds and you have to kill them.
Upgrades = Triangles
Bullet = angular rounded to defeat the round (The bulletis quite expensive, so you have to collect it again and again until oyu reach the door).

This is my first finished Game  ever and i hope you enjoy it.
But out of my own time planing, there is no time for Sounds and stuff...

Thanks and good LUCK  =)
